thread.title: MovieNews | Watch: There's a serious amount of top actors in the red band trailer for 'Triple 9'
thread.title_full: MovieNews | Watch: There's a serious amount of top actors in the red band trailer for 'Triple 9' - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: MovieNews | Watch: There's a serious amount of top actors in the red band trailer for 'Triple 9'
text:
Usually when a film combines an all-star cast we have to lower our expectations significantly (because we've all learned from 'Bobby' and 'Valentine's Day' etc. ) but John Hillcoat's 'Triple 9', starring Kate Winslet, Casey Affleck, Woody Harrelson, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Aaron Paul, Anthony Mackie, Gal Gadot, Norman Reedus, Teresa Palmer and Clifton Collins Jr. looks like it an absolute stomper.
Whether or not they all have significant screen time remains to be seen, but if the NSFW trailer below is anything to go by, it's time to get excited.
Here's the official synopsis:
In Triple 9, a crew of dirty cops is blackmailed by the Russian mob to execute a virtually impossible heist and the only way to pull it off is to manufacture a 999, police code for “officer down.” Their plan is turned upside down when the unsuspecting rookie they set up to die foils the attack, triggering a breakneck action-packed finale tangled with double-crosses, greed and revenge
'Triple 9' is expected in Irish cinemas in March 2016.
Via Yahoo
